name: Forum Permissions bbPress
author: Verdant Studio

sections.description:
Restrict the forum permissions per user role.

Features

  • Disallow certain roles from creating topics in a forum.
  • Disallow certain roles from creating replies in a forum.
sections.installation:
1. Upload forum-permissions-bbpress folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
sections.faq:
Is this plugin free to use?

Yes, you can use this plugin free of charge. However if you want to support the developer, you can donate to him via the donate link in the plugin description.

Is this plugin actively maintained?

This plugin does not require a lot of maintenance, however should the plugin break or become unstable, I will try to fix it as soon as possible.
